project_descr: The objective of the project is reduction of energy consumption from lighting, household appliances and building engineering equipment by introduction of modern energy efficiency standards in Armenia, Belarus, Kazakhstan and Kyrgyzstan.

outputs.output_descr: The project aims to provide regulatory framework to promote Energy Efficiency in countries of the Eurasian Economic Union, namely in Armenia, Belarus, Kazakstan and Kyrgyzstan

document_name: RFP 019/18 Development of regulatory framework on energy efficiency labels for the main groups of energy consuming devices in the Eurasian Economic Union.
project_title: energy efficiency regulatory framework in eastern europe
